title: If I Tell You a Secret : Interviewing (TEFC)
creator_credit: Richard Baker, Heidi Oatman and Bobb Bragg
brief_description: Details appropriate techniques to be used when interviewing the sexually abused child in order to obtain information that may be critical in ensuing court cases.
